snippet: According to a Jaguar spokesman, the bumpers and powertrain of the wagon, being shown in Geneva, were designed to meet European, not the somewhat different American, standards.
abstract: According to a Jaguar spokesman, the bumpers and powertrain of the wagon, being shown in Geneva, were designed to meet European, not the somewhat different American, standards.

headline.main: Jaguar XF Sportbrake Won't Join the Westward Wagon Train
